detailView.sql: SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN determination ON determination.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID INNER JOIN taxon ON determination.TaxonID = taxon.TaxonID WHERE (determination.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.LocalityName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s From collectingevent INNER JOIN locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE (collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND %s ORDER BY StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, taxon.FullName, %s From collectionobject INNER JOIN determination ON determination.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY CatalogNumber ASC

SELECT DISTINCT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN determination ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = determination.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, StartDate, StartDatePrecision, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, collector.OrderNumber, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND collectionobject.CollectionObjectID in (SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber) ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber
SELECT t1.TaxonID, t1.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.AcceptedID = t2.TaxonID WHERE %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, t.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN determination d ON d.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon t ON d.TaxonID = t.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t2.TaxonID = d.PreferredTaxonID WHERE d.TaxonId <> d.PreferredTaxonId AND t.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND (co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, deterTax.FullName, acceptTax.FullName, oldTax.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN determination d ON d.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon deterTax ON d.TaxonID = deterTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon acceptTax ON d.PreferredTaxonID = acceptTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon oldTax ON oldTax.AcceptedID = acceptTax.TaxonID AND oldTax.TaxonID != d.TaxonID WHERE (co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, FullName, %s From collectionobject INNER JOIN determination AS DT ON DT.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND DT.IsCurrent = true AND %s ORDER BY CatalogNumber ASC

SELECT agent.AgentID, agentvariant.Name, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agentvariant ON agent.AgentID = agentvariant.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY agentvariant.Name ASC

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, localitynamealias.Name, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localitynamealias ON locality.LocalityID = localitynamealias.LocalityID WHERE (locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, collectingevent.EndDatePrecision, %s From collectingevent INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID WHERE (collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND %s ORDER BY StartDate

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, locality.LocalityName, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID WHERE (locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY StartDate

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, taxon.fullName, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN accession ON accession.AccessionID = collectionobject.AccessionID INNER JOIN determination ON determination.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.taxonid = determination.taxonid WHERE determination.isCurrent AND (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, accessionagent.Role, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionagent ON accessionagent.AccessionID = accession.AccessionID INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = accessionagent.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, borrow.InvoiceNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, borrowagent.Role, %s FROM borrow INNER JOIN borrowagent ON borrowagent.BorrowID = borrow.BorrowID INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = borrowagent.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY InvoiceNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, appraisal.AppraisalNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, %s FROM appraisal INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = appraisal.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY AppraisalNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, geologictimeperiod.FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, %s FROM geologictimeperiod INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.chronosstratid = geologictimeperiod.geologictimeperiodid INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.PaleoContextID = paleocontext.PaleoContextID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY FullName, CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, collector.OrderNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collector ON collector.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = collector.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY LastName, FirstName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, collectingtrip.CollectingTripName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingtrip ON collectingtrip.collectingtripid = collectingevent.collectingtripid WHERE %s ORDER BY collectingTripName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT exchangein.exchangeinid, exchangein.ExchangeDate, exchangein.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangein INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangein.ReceivedFromOrganizationId WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT exchangeout.exchangeoutid, exchangeout.ExchangeDate, exchangeout.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangeout INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangeout.SentToOrganizationId WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT DISTINCT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE (collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND %s ORDER BY FullName,StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID WHERE %s AND (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) ORDER BY FullName,CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftpreparation ON giftpreparation.GiftID = gift.GiftID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = giftpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.preptypeid = preparation.preptypeid INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = preparation.CollectionObjectID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, giftagent.Role, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftagent ON giftagent.GiftID = gift.GiftID INNER JOIN agent on agent.AgentID = giftagent.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loanpreparation.LoanID = loan.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = loanpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.preptypeid = preparation.preptypeid INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = preparation.CollectionObjectID WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, loanagent.Role, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanagent ON loanagent.LoanID = loan.LoanID INNER JOIN agent on agent.AgentID = loanagent.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, lithostrat.FullName, %s FROM lithostrat INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.LithoStratID = lithostrat.LithoStratID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.PaleoContextID = paleocontext.PaleoContextID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY FullName, CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN accessionauthorization ON accessionauthorization.PermitID = permit.PermitID INNER JOIN accession ON accession.AccessionID = accessionauthorization.AccessionID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.AccessionID = accession.AccessionID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedToID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedByID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN project_colobj ON project_colobj.projectid = project.projectid INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = project_colobj.CollectionObjectID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = project.ProjectAgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = repositoryagreement.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND %s ORDER BY RepositoryAgreementNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, storage.Name, storage.FullName, %s FROM storage INNER JOIN preparation ON preparation.StorageID = storage.StorageID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = preparation.CollectionObjectID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY FullName, CatalogNumber

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, IsCurrent, FullName, %s From collectionobject INNER JOIN determination AS DT ON DT.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, CatalogNumber
SELECT cn.ContainerID, cn.Type, cn.Name, co.CatalogNumber, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN container cn ON co.ContainerID = cn.ContainerID WHERE (co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, co.CatalogedDate, cn.Name, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN container cn ON co.ContainerOwnerID = cn.ContainerID WHERE (cn.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s
SELECT cn.ContainerID, p.Name, cn.Name, %s FROM container p INNER JOIN container cn ON p.ContainerID = cn.ParentID WHERE (cn.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, exchangein.ExchangeDate, %s FROM exchangein INNER JOIN exchangeinprep ON exchangeinprep.ExchangeInID = exchangein.ExchangeInID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = exchangeinprep.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.preptypeid = preparation.preptypeid INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = preparation.CollectionObjectID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate,CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, exchangeout.ExchangeDate, %s FROM exchangeout INNER JOIN exchangeoutprep ON exchangeoutprep.ExchangeOutID = exchangeout.ExchangeOutID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = exchangeoutprep.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.preptypeid = preparation.preptypeid INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = preparation.CollectionObjectID WHERE (collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate,CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT ag.AgentID, av.Name, ag.DateOfBirth, ag.DateOfBirthPrecision, ag.DateOfDeath, ag.DateOfDeathPrecision, ag.DateType, agsp.SpecialtyName, %s FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID JOIN agentvariant av ON ag.AgentID = av.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentspecialty agsp ON ag.AgentID = agsp.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY ag.AgentID, av.Name, agsp.Role, agsp.OrderNumber

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, ac.AccessionNumber, cobc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, av.Name, ce.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectionobject_collobjbarcode cocobc ON co.CollectionObjectID = cocobc.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN collobjbarcode cobc ON cocobc.CollObjBarcodeID = cobc.CollObjBarcodeID LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agent ag ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType="4") JOIN preparation p ON co.CollectionObjectID = p.CollectionObjectID JOIN accessionpreparation ap ON p.PreparationID = ap.PreparationID JOIN accession ac ON ap.AccessionID ac.AccessionID WHERE %s ORDER BY ac.AccessionNumber, ap.PreparationID, co.CollectionObjectID, ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name, cobc.Barcode

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, cobc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, av.Name, ce.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectionobject_collobjbarcode cocobc ON co.CollectionObjectID = cocobc.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN collobjbarcode cobc ON cocobc.CollObjBarcodeID = cobc.CollObjBarcodeID LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agent ag ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType=4) LEFT JOIN preparation pp ON co.CollectionObjectID = pp.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN preparation_prepbarcode ppbc ON pp.PreparationID = ppbc.PreparationID LEFT JOIN prepbarcode pbc ON ppbc.PrepBarcodeID = pbc.PrepBarcodeID WHERE %s ORDER BY ifnull(cobc.Barcode, pbc.Barcode), co.CollectionObjectID, ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, rw.Title, cobc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, ce.StationFieldNumber, av.Name, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectionobject_collobjbarcode cocobc ON co.CollectionObjectID = cocobc.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN collobjbarcode cobc ON cocobc.CollObjBarcodeID = cobc.CollObjBarcodeID JOIN collectionobjectcitation coc ON co.CollectionObjectID = coc.CollectionObjectID JOIN referencework rw ON fc.ReferenceWorkID = rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN referenceworkvariant rvi ON rw.ReferenceWorkID = rvi.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agent ag ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType="4") WHERE %s ORDER BY rw.Title, co.CollectionObjectID, ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name, cobc.Barcode

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, cobc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, ce.StationFieldNumber, av.Name, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectionobject_collobjbarcode cocobc ON co.CollectionObjectID = cocobc.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN collobjbarcode cobc ON cocobc.CollObjBarcodeID = cobc.CollObjBarcodeID JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID JOIN agent ag ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType="4") WHERE %s ORDER BY ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name, cobc.Barcode

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, tx.FullName, cobc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, ce.StationFieldNumber, av.Name, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectionobject_collobjbarcode cocobc ON co.CollectionObjectID = cocobc.CollectionObjectID LEFT JOIN collobjbarcode cobc ON cocobc.CollObjBarcodeID = cobc.CollObjBarcodeID JOIN determination det ON frag.FragmentID = det.FragmentID JOIN taxon tx ON det.TaxonID = tx.TaxonID LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agent ag ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType="4") WHERE %s ORDER BY tx.FullName, co.CollectionObjectID, ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name, cobc.Barcode

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, ln.LoanNumber, pbc.Barcode, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision, av.Name, ce.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID = ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agent ON ctr.AgentID = ag.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON (ag.AgentID = av.AgentID AND av.VarType="4") JOIN preparation pp ON frag.PreparationID = pp.PreparationID JOIN loanpreparation lpo ON pp.PreparationID = lpo.PreparationID JOIN loan ln ON lpo.LoanID = ln.LoanID LEFT JOIN preparation_prepbarcode ppbc ON pp.PreparationID = ppbc.PreparationID LEFT JOIN prepbarcode pbc ON ppbc.PrepBarcodeID = pbc.PrepBarcodeID WHERE %s ORDER BY ln.LoanNumber, lpo.PreparationID, co.CollectionObjectID, ctr.AgentID, av.AgentID, av.Name, pbc.Barcode

SELECT ln.LoanID, ag.Abbreviation, ag.LastName, lna.Role, ln.LoanNumber, ln.LoanDate, ln.DateClosed, %s FROM loan ln JOIN loanagent lna ON ln.LoanID = lna.LoanID JOIN agent ag ON lna.AgentID = ag.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY ifnull(ag.Abbreviation, ag.LastName), ln.LoanNumber

SELECT ln.LoanID, pbc.Barcode, ln.LoanDate, ln.DateClosed, %s FROM loan ln JOIN loanpreparation lpo ON ln.LoanID = lpo.LoanID JOIN preparation pp ON lpo.PreparationID = pp.PreparationID JOIN preparation_prepbarcode ppbc ON pp.PreparationID = ppbc.PreparationID JOIN prepbarcode pbc ON ppbc.PrepBarcodeID = pbc.PrepBarcodeID WHERE %s ORDER BY ln.LoanNumber

SELECT ln.LoanID, pbc.Barcode, ln.LoanDate, ln.DateClosed, %s FROM loan ln JOIN loanpreparation lpo ON ln.LoanID = lpo.LoanID LEFT JOIN preparation pp ON lpo.PreparationID = pp.PreparationID LEFT JOIN preparation_prepbarcode ppbc ON pp.PreparationID = ppbc.PreparationID LEFT JOIN prepbarcode pbc ON ppbc.PrepBarcodeID = pbc.PrepBarcodeID LEFT JOIN fragment frag ON pp.PreparationID = frag.PreparationID LEFT JOIN determination det ON frag.FragmentID = det.FragmentID JOIN taxon tx ON (det.TaxonID = tx.TaxonID OR lpo.TaxonID = tx.TaxonID) WHERE %s ORDER BY tx.FullName, lpo.LoanPreparationID, frag.Identifier
SELECT rw.ReferenceWorkID, rwv.Name, rw.Text1, %s FROM referencework rw INNER JOIN referenceworkidentifier rwi ON rw.ReferenceWorkID = rwi.ReferenceWorkID WHERE %s ORDER BY rwi.Identifier, rw.Text1
SELECT rw.ReferenceWorkID, rwv.Name, rw.Text1, %s FROM referencework rw INNER JOIN referenceworkvariant rwv ON rw.ReferenceWorkID = rwv.ReferenceWorkID WHERE %s ORDER BY rwv.Name

SELECT accession.AccessionID, accession.AccessionNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionattachment ON accession.AccessionID = accessionattachment.AccessionID INNER JOIN attachment ON accessionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, attachment.Title, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agentattachment ON agent.AgentID = agentattachment.AgentID INNER JOIN attachment ON agentattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingeventattachment ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectingeventattachment.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectingeventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectionobjectattachment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectattachment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectionobjectattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID, conservdescription.ShortDesc, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservdescription INNER JOIN conservdescriptionattachment ON conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID = conservdescriptionattachment.ConservDescriptionID INNER JOIN attachment ON conservdescriptionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservevent.ConservEventID, conservevent.ExamDate, conservevent.TreatmentCompDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservevent INNER JOIN conserveventattachment ON conservevent.ConservEventID = conserveventattachment.ConservEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON conserveventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID, fieldnotebook.Name, fieldnotebook.StartDate, fieldnotebook.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebook INNER JOIN fieldnotebookattachment ON fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID = fieldnotebookattachment.FieldNotebookID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID, fieldnotebookpage.PageNumber, fieldnotebookpage.ScanDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpage INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpageattachment ON fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID = fieldnotebookpageattachment.FieldNotebookPageID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpageattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID, fieldnotebookpageset.OrderNumber, fieldnotebookpageset.StartDate, fieldnotebookpageset.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpageset INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpagesetattachment ON fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.FieldNotebookPageSetID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, attachment.Title, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localityattachment ON locality.LocalityID = localityattachment.LocalityID INNER JOIN attachment ON localityattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, permit.IssuedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN permitattachment ON permit.PermitID = permitattachment.PermitID INNER JOIN attachment ON permitattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT preparation.PreparationID, preparation.PreparedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM preparation INNER JOIN preparationattachment ON preparation.PreparationID = preparationattachment.PreparationID INNER JOIN attachment ON preparationattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, repositoryagreement.StartDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN repositoryagreementattachment ON repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID = repositoryagreementattachment.RepositoryAgreementID INNER JOIN attachment ON repositoryagreementattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, taxon.TaxonomicSerialNumber, attachment.Title, attachment.OrigFilename, %s FROM taxon INNER JOIN taxonattachment ON taxon.TaxonID = taxonattachment.TaxonID INNER JOIN attachment ON taxonattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName, agent.EMail, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Postalcode, address.Country FROM agent LEFT JOIN address ON agent.AgentID = address.AgentID WHERE (agent.DivisionID = DIVID) AND (%s) GROUP BY agent.AgentID

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, agent.LastName, permit.IssuedDate, permit.StartDate, permit.EndDate, permit.RenewalDate, permit.Type FROM permit LEFT JOIN agent ON permit.IssuedByID = agent.AgentID WHERE (%s)
SELECT AccessionID, AccessionNumber, Status, Type, DateAccessioned, DateReceived FROM accession WHERE (%s)

SELECT geography.GeographyID, geography.Name, geography.FullName, geographytreedefitem.Name FROM geography INNER JOIN geographytreedefitem ON geography.GeographyTreeDefItemID = geographytreedefitem.GeographyTreeDefItemID WHERE geography.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID AND (%s)
select PrepTypeID, Name FROM preptype where (CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)
SELECT DisciplineID, Type, Name FROM discipline WHERE (%s)
SELECT CatalogNumberingSchemeID, SchemeName, IsNumericOnly FROM catalognumberingscheme WHERE (%s)
SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName FROM taxon WHERE taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT AgentID, FirstName, LastName, MiddleInitial FROM agent WHERE (CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)
SELECT StorageID, Name, FullName FROM storage WHERE StorageTreeDefID = STORTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT LithoStratID, FullName FROM lithostrat WHERE LithoStratTreeDefID = LITHOTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT PaleoContextID, TopDistance, DistanceUnits FROM paleocontext WHERE (CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)

SELECT DISTINCT loan.LoanID, LoanNumber, LoanDate, CurrentDueDate, OriginalDueDate FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loan.LoanID = loanpreparation.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation ON loanpreparation.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON preparation.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN collection ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collection.CollectionID INNER JOIN collectiontype ON collection.DisciplineID = collectiontype.DisciplineID INNER JOIN specifyuser ON collectiontype.SpecifyUserID = specifyuser.SpecifyUserID WHERE specifyuser.SpecifyUserID = SPECIFYUSERID AND (loan.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (not (currentduedate is null)) AND (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null) AND datediff(CURDATE(), currentduedate) > 0
SELECT LocalityID, LocalityName,Latitude1,Longitude1 FROM locality WHERE (DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)
SELECT AttachmentID, OrigFilename FROM attachment WHERE (%s)
SELECT CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber FROM collectionobject WHERE (CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)
SELECT CollectingEventID, StationFieldNumber, StartDate, StartDatePrecision FROM collectingevent WHERE (DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND geologictimeperiod.IsBioStrat = 1 AND (%s)
SELECT JournalID, JournalName, JournalAbbreviation, ISSN, GUID FROM journal WHERE (%s)
SELECT AppraisalID, AppraisalNumber FROM appraisal WHERE (%s)
SELECT ReferenceWorkID, Title FROM referencework WHERE (%s)
SELECT CollectingTripID, CollectingTripName, StartDate FROM collectingtrip WHERE (DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)
SELECT DivisionID, Name FROM division WHERE (DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)
SELECT ProjectID, ProjectName, ProjectNumber FROM project WHERE (CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)
SELECT RepositoryAgreementID, RepositoryAgreementNumber, StartDate FROM repositoryagreement WHERE (DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)

SELECT fnbp.FieldNotebookPageID, PageNumber, ScanDate, fnps.StartDate, fnps.EndDate, fn.Name, fn.StartDate FROM fieldnotebookpage AS fnbp INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpageset AS fnps ON fnbp.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fnps.FieldNotebookPageSetID INNER JOIN fieldnotebook AS fn ON fnps.FieldNotebookID = fn.FieldNotebookID WHERE (fnbp.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)
SELECT MorphBankViewID, ViewName, SpecimenPart, ViewAngle, MorphBankExternalViewID FROM morphbankview WHERE (fnbp.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) AND (%s)

SELECT DISTINCT ag.AgentID, dv.Name, ag.FirstName, ag.LastName, ag.EMail, ad.Address, ad.City, ad.State, ad.Postalcode, ad.Country FROM agent ag INNER JOIN division dv ON ag.DivisionID = dv.DivisionID LEFT JOIN address ad ON ag.AgentID = ad.AgentID WHERE (%s) GROUP BY ag.AgentID
SELECT c.ContainerID, c.Name FROM container c WHERE (c.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)

SELECT c.ContainerID, c.Name, co.CatalogNumber FROM container AS c Left Join collectionobject AS co ON c.ContainerID = co.ContainerOwnerID WHERE co.CollectionObjectID IS NULL AND (c.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AND (%s)
select con.ContainerID, con.Name from container con where con.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY con.Name

SELECT distinct ag.AgentID, ag.LastName, ag.Abbreviation, ad.Address, ad.City, ad.State, ad.Postalcode, ad.Country FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ad ON (ag.AgentID = ad.AgentID AND ad.Ordinal=1) WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY ag.AgentID ORDER BY ag.Abbreviation, ag.LastName, ag.FirstName

SELECT pp.PreparationID, ppt.Name, pp.SampleNumber, pp.Text1, pbc.Barcode as Barcode FROM preparation pp JOIN preptype ppt ON pp.PrepTypeID=ppt.PrepTypeID LEFT JOIN preparation_prepbarcode ppbc on pp.PreparationID=ppbc.PreparationID LEFT JOIN prepbarcode pbc on ppbc.PrepBarcodeID=pbc.PrepBarcodeID WHERE pp.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY pbc.Barcode

SELECT ag.AgentID, av.Name, ag.DateOfBirth, ag.DateOfBirthPrecision, ag.DateOfDeath, ag.DateOfDeathPrecision, ag.DateType, agsp.SpecialtyName, %s FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID JOIN agentvariant av ON ag.AgentID = av.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentspecialty agsp ON ag.AgentID = agsp.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY ag.AgentID, av.Name, agsp.Role, agsp.OrderNumber

SELECT rw.ReferenceWorkID, rw.Text1, ag.LastName, rw.WorkDate, rwv.Name, rwi.Identifier FROM referencework rw LEFT JOIN referenceworkvariant rwv on rwv.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN referenceworkidentifier rwi on rwi.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN author au on au.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN agent ag on ag.AgentID=au.AgentID WHERE rw.ReferenceWorkType=6 AND (%s) ORDER BY rw.Text1
